video_title: My AI agents scrape Google Maps to make $$ in BORING businesses

content_profile.title: My AI agents scrape Google Maps to make $$ in BORING businesses

key_takeaways: Solution: Use AI to identify underserved micro-niches in tier 2/3 cities (Difficulty: intermediate)
Growth Tactic: Target customers through Google search since people look for local services on Google, not ChatGPT (Channel: seo)
AI Workflow: Local Niche Research Workflow
Strategy: Target underserved micro-niches in home services with high customer value
Strategy: Use AI workflows to identify and validate boring business opportunities
